user_question: How can I grow a bonsai tree indoors and generate an image of a bonsai tree in a modern living room?
final_answer: To grow a bonsai tree indoors, choose a suitable species like Ficus or Jade, use well-draining soil, ensure adequate sunlight, and water moderately. Image of a bonsai tree in a modern living room generated. Indoor bonsai trees thrive in bright, indirect sunlight. A south-facing window is ideal.
